entities.description: A group of people who are part of a magical team.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, who is supporting Bulgaria.

entities.name: bulgaria
entities.description: A country that Harry is supporting in a magical competition.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who is also participating in the competition.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: A person who is supporting Ireland and has a hat with shamrocks on it.

entities.name: ireland
entities.description: A country that Mr. Weasley is supporting in the competition.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend who is also participating in the competition and is trying to keep Harry focused.

entities.name: ludo bagman
entities.description: A person who is announcing the start of a magical competition.

entities.name: irish national team mascots
entities.description: A group of people who are part of Ireland's team in the competition.

entities.name: shamrocks

relationships.description: Harry is supporting Bulgaria in the competition.
Mr. Weasley is supporting Ireland in the competition.
Ron is also supporting Bulgaria, although he doesn't seem to be aware of it.
Hermione is trying to keep Harry focused and prevent him from getting distracted by the veela.
Ludo Bagman introduces the Irish National Team Mascots, which are a group of people who are part of Ireland's team in the competition.
